'''Angelimir''' ({{TA|2866}} – {{TA|2977|n}}, aged 111 years) was the twentieth [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].<ref name="Dol">{{PM|Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221</ref> 

==History==
Angelimir's reign was uneventful. He was eventually succeeded by his son [[Adrahil]] in {{TA|2977}}.<ref name="Dol"/>
